org.matrix.androidsdk.rest.callback

Class SimpleApiCallback<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matrix.androidsdk.rest.callback.SimpleApiCallback<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApiCallback<T>, ApiFailureCallback

    public class SimpleApiCallback<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ApiCallback<T>
    A stub implementation of ApiCallback which only chosen callbacks can be implemented.

      • SimpleApiCallback

        public SimpleApiCallback(ApiFailureCallback failureCallback)
        Constructor to delegate failure callback to another object. This allows us to stack failure callback implementations in a decorator-type approach.
        Parameters:
        failureCallback - the failure callback implementation to delegate to
